roleset.name: emit or project
roleset.note: RADIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'radiate' based on sentences in ectb english corpus. Based on VerbNet substance_emission-43.4 (from radiate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Today, with democracy, prosperity, and a high level of education, the people of Taiwan radiate an inner sense of confidence.
example.arg: with democracy, prosperity, and a high level of education

example.text: It does not seem likely that enough matter of this kind can enter the sun to account for its radiation of heat.
